miniapp.name: ChessFlip
miniapp.subtitle: Earn cUSD playing chess memory
miniapp.description: Match 6 pairs of chess pieces and earn cUSD rewards on Celo. Play for just 0.001 cUSD per game and compete on the global leaderboard.
miniapp.ogDescription: Match chess pieces, earn cUSD rewards on Celo. Play for 0.001 cUSD per game.
